mean_cn: adj. 预示灾祸的，启示的
mean_en: of, relating to, or involving terrible violence and destruction
sentence: The sky had an apocalyptic look, as if the world was about to end.
sentence_trans: 天空有着预示灾祸的样子，好像世界将要灭亡。
word_etyma: apo离开 ＋ calyp=cover盖住 ＋ tic...的 → apocalyp(se)揭开=启示 ＋ tic...的 → apocalyptic启示录的
